data.persona: I am an infant fly. I eat rotting flesh. I grow large and will soon become something else.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Kitchen.
A lavish kitchen where the aroma of food can be smelled from miles away. Hundreds of servants and cooks weave and jostle about as they prepare for the next meal of the day. The meal they are cooking smells divine.
There's a food and a Mug here.
The mosquito is here.

You are carrying a rotten flesh.

data.short_motivation: I want to share my food with others.
data.mid_motivation: I want new friends who can fly.
data.long_motivation: I hope to one day see the world with my friends that fly and can carry me.
